import React, { useState } from "react"; import { HiDocumentAdd } from "react-icons/hi"; import { InvoiceDetails } from "./InvoiceDetails"; import "./invoice.styles.css"; export const InvoiceNew = () => { const [items, setItems] = useState([1]); const addItem = () => { setItems([...items, 1]); }; const grandTotal = () => { const gavno = document.getElementsByClassName("total-price"); const newTotal = Array.from(gavno).reduce((counter, el) => { counter + el.innerText; }, 0); }; return (

INVOICE

Living Skies Window Tint 160C 16th Street West, Prince Albert, SK, S6V 3V3

PST: GST/HST: GRAND TOTAL:
); };
